name: PowerPlug
description:
Guide a socketbot and a plugbot through a series of increasingly challenging puzzles!

Made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left/Right Arrows - move

Space - jump

Space + Directional input - climb (with plugbot)

Tab - swap character

Left Mouse - fire socketbot

R - restart level

Sound effects from Zapsplat and Kenney!
